mapper.select: select * from reservation where reservation_staff_id = #{reservationStaffId} and reservation_date=#{reservationDate}

select P.patient_no, P.patient_name, P.patient_gender, P.patient_blood, P.patient_birth, R.reservation_date, R.reservation_time from patient P inner join reservation R on P.patient_no = R.reservation_patient_no where R.reservation_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select S.staff_name, S.staff_medical_department, P.patient_no, P.patient_name, P.patient_gender, P.patient_blood, P.patient_birth, R.reservation_date, R.reservation_time from patient P inner join reservation R on P.patient_no = R.reservation_patient_no inner join staff S on S.staff_id = R.reservation_staff_id where R.reservation_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and S.staff_medical_department = '외과'
